product_name: MACStudio Fix Mattifine 12hr Shine Control Matte Primer
summary: SummaryThe MAC Studio Fix Mattifine 12hr Shine Control Primer is a mattifying primer that delivers an all-day reduction in the appearance of pores, controls oil and shine, and promises an improvement in skin texture for up to six hours. Achieve complexion perfection with this matte primer.
details: DetailsBenefitsControls oil & shine, 12 hoursReduces the appearance of pores, 8 hoursImproves skin texture, 6 hoursImproves quality of foundation wear, 12 hoursOil-freeImmediately mattifies skinSweat- and humidity-resistantDoes not clog pores/does not cause acneFeaturesMatte primerStart your customized complexion routine with MAC's must-have mattifying primerThe transformative gel-to-powder primer formula feels weightless with a velvety, powder-soft finishKey IngredientsShine-controlling Oil-Check Complex and infused with lactobionic acid (PHA), algae extract and witch hazelItem 2587732How To UseSmooth primer evenly onto cleansed face after moisturizer (and before foundation) with fingertips, sponge or brush.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Dimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth primer evenly onto cleansed face after moisturizer (and before foundation) with fingertips, sponge or brush.

reviews.headline: didn't like it
reviews.comments: its blurring when you first apply it which is nice but i have oily skin and it does nothing for that. i have non "oil control" primers that work better.

reviews.headline: Perfectly mate
reviews.comments: My skin looks mate and feels so soft. The product is light white, so doesn't give any color to your face, but instantly made your face mate. It is easy to use. The size is perfect, good quantity. I like to keep just with this primer and go, so my skin looks perfect.

reviews.headline: Great oil control
reviews.comments: I have oil skin an it works great

reviews.headline: This is the bomb!!!!
reviews.comments: This was recommended but EXCEEDED my expectations, omg. I no longer look like my face bleeds oil.

reviews.headline: Ehhh good and bad
reviews.comments: Its a good primer in theory - not heavy, plays well with studio fix liquid and powder, but omg it makes me so oily

reviews.headline: Appeared to be Working
reviews.comments: It seems like the oil and/or shine is slowly but surely peeping through. It's better than no primer. I know I am extremely oily/shiny. I don't know if there's anything out there to help the extra extra oily/shiny faces.

reviews.headline: The best!!!
reviews.comments: Most definitely the best!!! It gives you that nice flawless matte look and my face has acne scars and large pores.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy this again. Controls shine and pores
Best Primer Ever
reviews.comments: I've tried lots of primers to help blur my pores and this is the one that works! My makeup lasts all day with no oily look. Great for t-zone faces! Will definitely be buying again and again

reviews.headline: Yes be purchasing this product again
reviews.comments: This the best one that I have found so far

reviews.headline: Literal MAGIC
reviews.comments: I have absolutely no idea how makeup works half the time, but let me tell you this one is literally magic on my skin. My big pore zones on my nose and t-zone almost completely disappeared after applying this cream! It's so smooth and easy to apply too!

reviews.headline: Eh?
reviews.comments: I mean‚Ä¶ like initially it does a great job of mattifying. It looks great until maybe 4 hours later and then my makeup melts and breaks apart. Idk maybe im jusy extremely oily

reviews.headline: 1 year in - new holy grail!!!
reviews.comments: This is the BEST oil control primer I have found! It lasts all day and doesn't pill under my makeup. I'm using this forever. I even wear it on days i dont wear makeup!

reviews.headline: Best primer ever
reviews.comments: Been using this under my makeup minimizes my pores makes my makeup look flawless. Love it ü•∞

reviews.headline: Great Matifying
reviews.comments: This is great if you have oily skin like me. It has helped my makeup last longer, and I have felt less shiny in my T-Zone. This stuff has allowed me to feel more confident while wearing my makeup 8-10 hours, instead of 2-4. It seems to have helped with acne breakouts in that area as well by helping me cut down on the oil with my skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: Like every oil control product, I was excited to try this. Unfortunately, I'm still dabbing my nose and forehead throughout the day. I'm going to return it.

reviews.headline: Ridiculous price for something that doesn't work
reviews.comments: I'm an oily person unfortunately. I will wash my hair and it will be oily by the end of the day and that also applies to my face. This in no way shape or form controls oil. I put it on and before I even left the house I was shiney. I looked like I was sweating the entire night and I'm so disappointed in this product. I'll be returning immediately.

reviews.headline: Photo shop look!!
reviews.comments: I love this primer and all of MAC's products!!!

reviews.headline: I am an OIL Slick and this Actually works!!!
reviews.comments: I tried 10+ primers for oily skin to find one that would last my entire wedding day- this is the one!!!! All the other ones would eventually let oil through which would break up my makeup and I would look patchy. Mac helps to fill in pores and smooth face and the oil control is AMAZING!! Worth every penny for oily skin.

reviews.headline: Works very well
reviews.comments: This definitely keeps oil away for a long time. I only use it on my eyes so the amount last me long. My only issue is the part around the bottom of the nozzle cracked soon after I got it. I was able to use it by pushing that closed first, but still had a few times where alot came out. I only used a tiny dot at a time so a bunch cominh out was just a waste :/ but it works great so here I am getting more.

media.headline: I am an OIL Slick and this Actually works!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: Worth every penny!! I am so happy I took a chance on this product, it actually does everything it claims. It leaves a matt finish without looking dull & has a blurring effect that I love. A tiny amount is truly all you need to control oils and have a flawless matt finish to layer your foundations or powders over. I've even worn it by itself, it's that good at controlling shine. I have oily combo skin that tends to lean more oily certain times of the month and all the time during the summer. This is now my holy grail for keeping my complexion from looking like an oil slick. Even holds up in the Louisiana heat & humidity. So my fellow oily friend, trust your big sis and give this magic primer a try‚ô•Ô∏è
faceoff_positive.headline: üíØ Recommend!

faceoff_negative.comments: I got this to replace my old (holy grail) Rimmel matte primer that is no longer sold anywhere. This had good reviews and a similar consistency, so I was sold. However, immediately after using this product my foundation was super cakey. I have combination skin and I only applied this in my oily areas. I hoped it would get better within a few hours after it settled into my skin. However, I noticed throughout the day that my foundation looked dry and flaked off in some spots and then rubbed off in others. My makeup normally lasts 12+ hours. I returned immediately after my first use and I will be trying the fenty beauty matte primer next.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dry, flaky patches and cakey makeup

rollup.name: Studio Fix Mattifine 12hr Shine Control Matte Primer
